Skin.Name: 惊人的马戏鸟笼
Skin.Introduction:
Circus freak not included.
2018年9月27日-2018年10月11日

Skin.Name: 华丽的雨量计
Skin.Introduction:
Guess the rainfall.
2018年10月11日-2018年10月25日

Skin.Name: 惊人的驯兽师帽
Skin.Introduction:
Come one, come all.
2018年10月25日-2018年11月8日

Skin.Name: 马戏女骑手头饰
Skin.Introduction:
Enter the ring.
2018年11月8日-2018年11月22日

Skin.Name: 热力测力器
Skin.Introduction:
Step right up.
2018年11月22日-2018年12月6日

Skin.Name: 头等大雨伞
Skin.Introduction:
Keeping dry is the main attraction.
2018年12月6日-2018年12月20日

Skin.Name: 壮观的引路牌
Skin.Introduction:
Restrooms over here.
2018年12月20日-2019年1月3日

Skin.Name: 世界上最宏伟的大帐篷
Skin.Introduction:
Have the World's Greatest Dreams.
2019年1月3日-2019年1月17日

Skin.Name: T恤
Skin.Introduction: A '{Color}' colored shirt. Wilson is working on a W-shirt, but this prototype came out more T-shaped.

Skin.Name: 褶条衬衫
Skin.Introduction: Get your glad rags on with this '{Color}' colored shirt.

Skin.Name: 伐木工衬衫
Skin.Introduction: Well, it's not buckskin but it's still skookum. It's '{Color}' colored with no foofaraw.

Skin.Name: 纽扣衬衫
Skin.Introduction: A shirt that buttons up the front, in a '{Color}' color. Luckily for you, the fabric is a non-iron material. Unfortunately, the placket will still wrinkle as you wear it.

Skin.Name: 有领衬衫
Skin.Introduction: A '{Color}' colored polo shirt. Don't let your collar flap in the wind.

Skin.Name: 开襟毛衫
Skin.Introduction: A '{Color}' colored cardigan. As soft as it is comfortable.

Skin.Name: 挂带衬衫
Skin.Introduction: Wearing this '{Color}' colored shirt makes you feel like the cat's pajamas.

Skin.Name: 毛衣背心
Skin.Introduction: An '{Color}' colored vest made of the finest beefalo wool. Unfortunately, it's not actually warm.

Skin.Name: 粗花呢背心
Skin.Introduction: Don't get lost in the tweeds wearing this '{Color}' colored souvenir from the Village of Tweed.

Skin.Name: 风衣
Skin.Introduction: A fashionable but unprotective trench coat in a '{Color}' color.

Skin.Name: 工作服
Skin.Introduction: These sturdy '{Color}' colored overalls are great for plumbing the depths.

Skin.Name: 杰米衬衫
Skin.Introduction: Don't worry if this '{Color}' colored pajama top is too big on you. That just makes it cuter.

Skin.Name: 宽外袍
Skin.Introduction: As they say, "when in Rome"!

Skin.Name: 无袖衬衫
Skin.Introduction: This 'downright neighborly yellow' top just screams "springtime"! Seriously. Please make it stop screaming.

Skin.Name: 绗缝外套
Skin.Introduction: A majestic quilted outfit with just the right amount of poofiness.

Skin.Name: 丝绸长袍
Skin.Introduction: So smooth, you'll never want to let go of this '{Color}' colored robe.

Skin.Name: 精致外衣
Skin.Introduction: A cute and snuggly coat dress in "Higgsbury red".

Skin.Name: 丝绸便服
Skin.Introduction: Bathe under the new moon in comfort and luxury with this silk '{Color}' colored loungewear.

Skin.Name: 睡衣
Skin.Introduction: It might look a bit itchy, but this '{Color}' nightgown is actually the coziest thing in the world.

Skin.Name: 荷边花裙
Skin.Introduction: Flouncy, bouncy, and so much fun!

Skin.Name: 游艇服饰
Skin.Introduction: "Yacht not included."

Skin.Name: 毛绒大衣
Skin.Introduction: The floofy collar of this 'fishy tincture orange' coat won't keep you any warmer, but it looks incredible!

Skin.Name: 索扣夹克
Skin.Introduction: This is one of those jackets where the pockets are just decorative. Oh well, at least it looks nice.

Skin.Name: 晚礼服
Skin.Introduction: Some events ask for white tie, and some ask for black tie. Well, this is red tie.

Skin.Name: 鸡尾酒会礼服
Skin.Introduction: Everybody needs a little black dress. (Conveniently, it hides ash stains.)

Skin.Name: 食堂礼服
Skin.Introduction: Formal dinner attire for military officers.

Skin.Name: 派对连衣裙
Skin.Introduction: A cute party dress with puffed sleeves.

Skin.Name: 正礼机身
Skin.Introduction: But of course it has a cummerbund.

Skin.Name: 舞会袍
Skin.Introduction: Be the life of the party in this gray silk ball gown.

Skin.Name: 加拿大夹克
Skin.Introduction: A real Canadian Jacket, made for real Canadians. (Not out of real Canadians.)

Skin.Name: 晚礼服
Skin.Introduction: A fancy flowing shirt with formal trousers.

Skin.Name: 引人注目的礼服
Skin.Introduction: The delightful aroma of mothballs and decay wafts off it.

Skin.Name: 瓦尔基里盔甲
Skin.Introduction: Be a knight in shining armor. Or at least look like one. (It's just a costume, not real armor.)

Skin.Name: 正式夹克
Skin.Introduction: A black blazer with a red scarf.

Skin.Name: 裙式外套
Skin.Introduction: A formal blazer and matching skirt for a sensible party gal.

Skin.Name: 皱破的服装
Skin.Introduction: This outfit may have been attacked by weevils. Or something worse.

Skin.Name: 破烂的衣服
Skin.Introduction: These clothes aren't good for anything except fueling a fire.

Skin.Name: 补丁紧身衣
Skin.Introduction: Wearing fur makes you feel like mighty animal!

Skin.Name: 破碎的裙子
Skin.Introduction: This skirt has had a close brush with the forces of darkness.

Skin.Name: 重创的机身
Skin.Introduction: It may have seen better days, but this body is still minimally functional.

Skin.Name: 破烂的衣服
Skin.Introduction: Living outdoors may be healthy, but it's sure hard on your clothing.

Skin.Name: 肮脏的衣服
Skin.Introduction: Trees are great, but clothing doesn't grow on them.

Skin.Name: 破旧的衣服
Skin.Introduction: If these clothes could talk just imagine the stories they would tell.

Skin.Name: 破损的服饰
Skin.Introduction: A tragic end to a once-dapper three piece suit.

Skin.Name: 损坏的战服
Skin.Introduction: This costume looks a little the worse for wear, but the performance must go on.

Skin.Name: 缠着绷带的身体
Skin.Introduction: Spiderwebs are pretty useful for bandaging scrapes.

Skin.Name: 用坏的工作服
Skin.Introduction: You're just about overall this wilderness survival.

Skin.Name: 非暗影礼服
Skin.Introduction: A suit made of shadows. Quite the opposite of flashy.

Skin.Name: 暗影连衣裙
Skin.Introduction: This dress flickers as if it were on fire... If that fire were made of shadows.

Skin.Name: 暗影连衣服
Skin.Introduction: These clothes put hair on your chest.

Skin.Name: 暗影连衣裙
Skin.Introduction: Finally the darkness envelops you, as you always knew it would.

Skin.Name: 暗影机身
Skin.Introduction: A dark automaton chassis with a lovely decorative gemstone.

Skin.Name: 暗影长袍
Skin.Introduction: This dress is made from many shadow fragments sewn together.

Skin.Name: 暗影伐木工的衣服
Skin.Introduction: Clothes for leaping from tree to tree and eating buttered scones.

Skin.Name: 酷影衣服
Skin.Introduction: Dark clothes for cool people.

Skin.Name: 非暗影礼服
Skin.Introduction: This look hearkens back to a simpler time. You are missed, Charlie.

Skin.Name: 暗影盔甲
Skin.Introduction: Dark armor. It looks nice, but unfortunately shadows have no substance.

Skin.Name: 暗影蜘蛛身体
Skin.Introduction: The hollowed out body of an elegant black widow.

Skin.Name: 暗影罩衣
Skin.Introduction: Blood is thicker than water. Oil is thicker than both.

Skin.Name: 猪人守卫套装
Skin.Introduction: Dress up like an intimidating Pig Guard for Hallowed Nights!

Skin.Name: 龙蝇套装
Skin.Introduction: Be a terrifying Dragonfly for Hallowed Nights!

Skin.Name: 海象套装
Skin.Introduction: Dress up as an old MacTusk for Hallowed Nights!

Skin.Name: 诱饵草套装
Skin.Introduction: Look the part of an alluring Lureplant.

Skin.Name: 战车套装
Skin.Introduction: This Rook Hallowed Nights costume will give you a run for your money.

Skin.Name: 电羊套装
Skin.Introduction: This electrifying costume will let your dress up like a cute Volt Goat!

Skin.Name: 树人套装
Skin.Introduction: This Treeguard Hallowed Nights costume will really grow on you.

Skin.Name: 曼德拉草套装
Skin.Introduction: A Hallowed Nights costume fashioned after a delightfully annoying vegetable.

Skin.Name: 坎普斯套装
Skin.Introduction: Dress up as a spooky Krampus for Hallowed Nights.

Skin.Name: 巨鹿套装
Skin.Introduction: Look like an intimidating Deerclops with this Hallowed Nights costume.

Skin.Name: 蝙蝠套装
Skin.Introduction: Look the part of a spooky Batilisk.

Skin.Name: 草丛壁虎套装
Skin.Introduction: Dress up like a cute Grass Gekko for Hallowed Nights.

Skin.Name: 淬炼护胸
Skin.Introduction: Trimmed with the fur of felled quarry.

Skin.Name: 战士的束腰外衣
Skin.Introduction: This battle tunic screams "warrior chic".

Skin.Name: 战神的护胸
Skin.Introduction: Bare your mighty muscles and let your foes know what they're up against.

Skin.Name: 篡位者的皱衣
Skin.Introduction: A belt of fangs suits any steadfast fighter.

Skin.Name: 铸铁机身
Skin.Introduction: Make sure your minions know who's top robot.

Skin.Name: 冶金家的长袍
Skin.Introduction: Bend the metallic elements to your will in this sleek purple robe.

Skin.Name: 格斗家的甲胄
Skin.Introduction: Let everyone know you're ready for a brawl with this harness.

Skin.Name: 决斗者的盔甲
Skin.Introduction: Stun your enemies into silence.

Skin.Name: 炼金术师的法袍
Skin.Introduction: Brew alchemical mixtures in style with this alchemist's robe top.

Skin.Name: 战神的护胸
Skin.Introduction: This decorative battle armor is sure to strike fear into the foes of the Valkyrie.

Skin.Name: 魔鬼的外骨骼
Skin.Introduction: You don't want to know what spiders do with their prey.

Skin.Name: 熔炼工的围裙
Skin.Introduction: An apron to wear to the sweltering fires of The Forge.

Skin.Name: 花园玫瑰服
Skin.Introduction: Rose cultivation is truly a most delicate science.

Skin.Name: 丝绒玫瑰连衣裙
Skin.Introduction: Momentarily slake your thirst for fire and brimstone by wrapping yourself in a lovely frock.

Skin.Name: 马戏团玫瑰服
Skin.Introduction: When the muscle is stripped away all that remains is a sweet, delicate flower.

Skin.Name: 玫瑰披肩
Skin.Introduction: The captive rose is bound by the lattice.

Skin.Name: 玫瑰容器
Skin.Introduction: Vines wrapped around wires, wires wrapped around vines.

Skin.Name: 传家宝玫瑰礼服
Skin.Introduction: All the culture and elegance of an Old Garden rose.

Skin.Name: 玫瑰服
Skin.Introduction: Wildrose, grow wild and free.

Skin.Name: 绿玫瑰乐团服
Skin.Introduction: No outfit is too loud when you're a rosy-cheeked mime.

Skin.Name: 扭曲的玫瑰服
Skin.Introduction: People should know better than to grow too close to you.

Skin.Name: 舞台玫瑰服
Skin.Introduction: The perfect ensemble for a Buff Beauty.

Skin.Name: 苔藓玫瑰窗帘
Skin.Introduction: Wild flowers are just as beautiful as any fancy show rose.

Skin.Name: 珊瑚玫瑰长裤
Skin.Introduction: Wild roses don't claim hillsides by being delicate.

Skin.Name: 霜袍
Skin.Introduction: This frosted tunic smells like fresh snow.

Skin.Name: 冰火连衣裙
Skin.Introduction: Much like coldfire itself, this cape and frock shalln't warm their wearer.

Skin.Name: 陈旧的霜袍
Skin.Introduction: The robe of a man who embodies the spirit of giving.

Skin.Name: 冰霜女童连衣裙
Skin.Introduction: A lovely dress in which to wander the frozen glades.

Skin.Name: 浮冰长袍
Skin.Introduction: An elegant dress to wear while keeping the common folk at arm's length.

Skin.Name: 雪蜘蛛躯干
Skin.Introduction: This fluffy white spider body comes with a warm scarf!

Skin.Name: 手套
Skin.Introduction: These are gloves. They cover your hands. This pair is '{Color}' colored.

Skin.Name: 长手套
Skin.Introduction: '{Color}' colored gloves suitable for all types of persons, robots, and monsters.

Skin.Name: 扣带手套
Skin.Introduction: '{Color}' colored gloves with a buckle on the back to help you hold it together.

Skin.Name: 驾驶员手套
Skin.Introduction: These 'houndbone white' colored gloves are worn by good looking people who look cool.

Skin.Name: 礼服手套
Skin.Introduction: These gloves will hide the chemical stains on your hands when you dress up for formal occasions.

Skin.Name: 引人注目的手套
Skin.Introduction: White gloved hands are sometimes a symbol of deception. They're also a symbol of fashion!

Skin.Name: 淬炼护腕
Skin.Introduction: These bracers will help you look the part in the arena.

Skin.Name: 战士护腕
Skin.Introduction: A fine leather set of bracers to wear into battle.

Skin.Name: 狂战士手套
Skin.Introduction: Your mighty fists need no armor, only slight embellishment.

Skin.Name: 篡位者护手
Skin.Introduction: These handwraps are imbued with a quiet ferocity.

Skin.Name: 铸铁拳套
Skin.Introduction: Make them regret falling into your metallic clutches.

Skin.Name: 炼金术士手套
Skin.Introduction: A thin strip of cloth to protect your caster's hands.

Skin.Name: 打架者手套
Skin.Introduction: These leather gloves have small holes cut in them for the knuckles to show through.

Skin.Name: 决斗者手套
Skin.Introduction: A light gauntlet design for an expert duelist.

Skin.Name: 炼金术士的护手
Skin.Introduction: The handwraps of an alchemist, skilled at battle.

Skin.Name: 战神的长手套
Skin.Introduction: These fists are ready for glorious battle.

Skin.Name: 魔鬼的爪子
Skin.Introduction: Perhaps after battle you could take up decorative hedge trimming.

Skin.Name: 熔炉手套
Skin.Introduction: Any pair of gloves can be improved by brass plating.

Skin.Name: 冰霜手套
Skin.Introduction: The gloves of a fellow with an icy touch.

Skin.Name: 冰火手套
Skin.Introduction: Two small tufts of rabbit fur to adorn the wrists.

Skin.Name: 陈旧的手套
Skin.Introduction: These gloves fail to keep the cold out, although they inspire a feeling of coziness.

Skin.Name: 冰霜女童手套
Skin.Introduction: A thin pair of winter gloves.

Skin.Name: 浮冰蓝宝石
Skin.Introduction: Sleek arm covers that radiate cool, clear refinement.

Skin.Name: 裤子
Skin.Introduction: Wearing these '{Color}' colored pants won't help you survive... But you'll look great!

Skin.Name: 裙子
Skin.Introduction: Wearing this '{Color}' colored skirt won't help you survive... But you'll look great!

Skin.Name: 格子裤子
Skin.Introduction: These '{Color}' colored pants are perfect for playing checkers, or checking items off your to-do list.

Skin.Name: 膝盖裤
Skin.Introduction: Enjoy a knickerbocker glory in these '{Color}' colored knickerbockers.

Skin.Name: 格子裙
Skin.Introduction: This '{Color}' colored skirt isn't a proper kilt, but you feel vaguely Scottish anyway.

Skin.Name: 杰米长裤
Skin.Introduction: No striped pajama squid were harmed in the making of these '{Color}' colored naptime pants.

Skin.Name: 淬炼绑腿
Skin.Introduction: A pair of fur-trimmed leggings and a broad leather belt.

Skin.Name: 战士皮裙
Skin.Introduction: A decorative leather skirt for a fiery fighter.

Skin.Name: 狂战士腰带
Skin.Introduction: Berserkers have no need of pants!

Skin.Name: 铸铁腿
Skin.Introduction: This backplate was cast in the fires of The Forge.

Skin.Name: 格斗家绑腿
Skin.Introduction: A pair of battle leggings with a studded leather belt.

Skin.Name: 炼金术师的法袍
Skin.Introduction: The preferred armor of the deadly alchemist.

Skin.Name: 战神腿甲
Skin.Introduction: They'll never see your powerful kicks coming.

Skin.Name: 熔炉裤子
Skin.Introduction: Breathable trousers to withstand the sweltering heat of The Forge.

Skin.Name: 冰霜裤子
Skin.Introduction: These worn slacks have seen many a chilly winter.

Skin.Name: 陈旧的裤子
Skin.Introduction: An old, traditional pair of trousers in a 'monastral blue' hue.

Skin.Name: 雪蜘蛛休闲裤
Skin.Introduction: A wintry pair of plaid trousers.

Skin.Name: 短靴
Skin.Introduction: A pair of 'scribble black' colored boot devices.

Skin.Name: 运动鞋
Skin.Introduction: Wear these '{Color}' colored sneakers surreptitiously.

Skin.Name: 扣带低跟鞋
Skin.Introduction: Hit the jackpot with these classic 'pure white' colored Mary Janes.

Skin.Name: 轻便帆布鞋
Skin.Introduction: Dress to the nines in these 'pure white' colored shoes.

Skin.Name: 低跟鞋
Skin.Introduction: Low-heeled 'scribble black' colored dress shoes.

Skin.Name: 高跟鞋
Skin.Introduction: High-heeled 'scribble black' colored dress shoes.

Skin.Name: 马靴
Skin.Introduction: A pair of 'pure white' colored riding boots. Yee-haw!

Skin.Name: 加拿大靴
Skin.Introduction: Infused with maple syrup and essence of moose. This pair is a tasteful 'werebeaver brown' color.

Skin.Name: 钢头皮靴
Skin.Introduction: These '{Color}' colored boots will protect you from stubbing your toes, but not a whole lot else.

Skin.Name: 凉鞋
Skin.Introduction: A pair of 'catcoon blue' colored sandals, with socks (for extra fashion).

Skin.Name: 淬炼之靴
Skin.Introduction: You were born to battle. You feel it in your soles.

Skin.Name: 战士拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: Thick straps make these fur-trimmed sandals sturdy and comfortable.

Skin.Name: 狂战士靴
Skin.Introduction: Even berserkers like having warm feet.

Skin.Name: 篡位者拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: A pair of fur-trimmed sandals for a usurper to wear.

Skin.Name: 铸铁靴
Skin.Introduction: These boots were made for crushing, and that's just what they'll do.

Skin.Name: 炼金术士拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: Sandals with leather tops to prevent accidental spilling of metallurgist's concoctions.

Skin.Name: 格斗家靴
Skin.Introduction: A sensible pair of boots to keep you on balance in the ring.

Skin.Name: 决斗者拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: A breathable pair of duelist's sandals to wear into the ring.

Skin.Name: 炼金术士靴
Skin.Introduction: Powerful spells are best followed by a click of the heels.

Skin.Name: 战神拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: A pair of battlemaster's sandals to wear into the arena.

Skin.Name: 魔鬼脚爪
Skin.Introduction: Freshly sharpened spider toesies, ready for a fight.

Skin.Name: 熔炉靴
Skin.Introduction: Nothing beats a pair of brass-toed boots.

Skin.Name: 冰霜之靴
Skin.Introduction: Pointy shoes for a frigid fellow.

Skin.Name: 冰火之靴
Skin.Introduction: A pair of stylish heels accented by a puff of rabbit fur.

Skin.Name: 陈旧的毡靴
Skin.Introduction: A handsome pair of traditional winter boots.

Skin.Name: 冰霜女童毡靴
Skin.Introduction: A lovely pair of traditional winter boots.

Skin.Name: 浮冰高跟鞋
Skin.Introduction: White heels, each adorned with a piercing ice crystal.

Skin.Name: 血蜘蛛拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: A fuzzy pair of wintry snow slippers.

Skin.Name: 兔毛拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: Show those bunnies what's what by wearing this pair of fuzzy 'snail mucus purple' colored bunny slippers.

Skin.Name: 毛绒拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: Warm, fuzzy, 'anthropomorphic feline blue' colored slippers. A spot of cheer in a hostile world.

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Formal Wilson is unhappy Wilson.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Willow prefers events that include bonfires or fireworks.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Wolfgang enjoys formal dinners: the food is usually excellent.

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Wendy is not cheered by party games.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: ERROR: DO NOT RECOGNIZE COMMAND "MOUSTACHE.TWIRL"

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Since Wickerbottom doesn't sleep, she can dance all night.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Woodie puts bear fat in his hair when he goes out.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Formal Wes requires extra pomade.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Against all possible odds Maxwell has become even more dapper.

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: She resembles a Visigothic princess.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: Webber takes parties seriously.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 贵宾
Skin.Introduction: This isn't what Winona expected when she read "Formal Assembly" on the invitation.

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: As a scientist, Wilson is well equipped to investigate the natural world.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: Willow is taming the wilderness with fire.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: In the wilderness, only the mighty survive.

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: Wendy is actually pretty good at surviving.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: Exposure to the elements causes corrosion.

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: Those with knowledge are good at making do in difficult circumstances.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: Woodie looks like he's turning into a tree.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: Even mimes can fight if confronted with a monster.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: This is Maxwell, the intrepid explorer.

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: A warrior cannot eat until she defeats some meat.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: Webber looks a little worse for the wear.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 幸存者
Skin.Introduction: Winona's always been made of rough stuff.

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: Wilson has learned the science of shadows.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: Willow enjoys flickering flames of inky blackness.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: Wolfgang is even mightier than usual.

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: Wendy has always been comfortable with darkness.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: This robot was evil before. Now they're double evil.

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: A librarian knows how to watch from the shadows.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: The shadow realm is pretty much the same as here, just darker.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: The sun is too bright. It blots out the darkness.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 败北
Skin.Introduction: Before it all went so wrong...

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: Go to the dark side and be on top of the world.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: Dark spiders have poisonous fangs.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 凯旋
Skin.Introduction: No one knows the depths of Winona's dark machinations.

Skin.Name: 猪-博瑞面具
Skin.Introduction: Wilson usually forgets to put a costume together until the last moment. He's always busy experimenting.

Skin.Name: 薇-蝇的头
Skin.Introduction: Willow would dress like this every day if she could.

Skin.Name: 海象-夫冈的秃头套
Skin.Introduction: It seems a shame to hide such luxurious hair.

Skin.Name: 温迪-花朵的头
Skin.Introduction: Wendy quite fancies this hair color.

Skin.Name: 战车-机器的头部件
Skin.Introduction: The welding on this costume took AGES.

Skin.Name: 伏特-伯顿女士的羊角
Skin.Introduction: An elegant costume for an elegant woman.

Skin.Name: 伍-树的头
Skin.Introduction: Woodie will have twigs stuck in his beard for weeks. Not that that's unusual.

Skin.Name: 维斯-德拉装饰
Skin.Introduction: What's the sound of one mandrake meeping?

Skin.Name: 坎普-威尔的头
Skin.Introduction: Maxwell deeply regrets asking the others to choose his costume for him.

Skin.Name: 鹿-格弗里德面具
Skin.Introduction: Wigfrid chose to be one of her favorite foes to battle for Hallowed Nights.

Skin.Name: 韦-蝠的头
Skin.Introduction: Gosh, those wings look very... real.

Skin.Name: 诺娜-壁虎的头
Skin.Introduction: It wasn't easy for Winona to get her hair like that.

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: Wilson is willing to take on any challenger.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: Willow will reduce this ring to cinders.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: This look suits Wolfgang, and he knows it.

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: Wendy's hidden ruthlessness needed only slight provocation to show itself.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: WX's transformation into an organic killing machine proves all dreams are possible, if you only believe.

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: Wickerbottom adapted to life in the arena with grace and ease.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: Woodie is a wild man in the arena.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: Beware the battle mime.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: Maxwell is both dark AND brooding.

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: The question was never IF Wigfrid would master the ring, but when.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: It's not wise to corner venomous spiders.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 角斗士
Skin.Introduction: Winona's tough as nails and ready to throw down.

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: Who knew rose dye was so permanent?

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: Willow was always a bit prickly. Now she's just moreso.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: This moustache doesn't tickle, it prickles.

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: A dark crimson rose represents mourning.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: The organics have inextricably grown on WX... Regrettable.

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: Now duel for the rose queen's amusement.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: Woodie tends his own garden more often than he tends his own hair.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: Wes always felt his rosy cheeks were his best feature.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: Ladies and gentlemen, a round of applause for our lovely assistant.

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: Wigfrid was born for the part of Red Queen.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: The rosebuds are tangled in there real good.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 玫瑰
Skin.Introduction: By any other name, she'd smell of engine grease.

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 落雪
Skin.Introduction: The chill of the first frost of winter has beset poor Wilson.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 落雪
Skin.Introduction: Coldfire is Willow's favorite type of fire... After hot fire, warm fire, tepid fire, and vaguely lukewarm fire.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 落雪
Skin.Introduction: Wolfgang enjoys passing cold winter nights around a fire with loved ones.

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 落雪
Skin.Introduction: Wendy feels cold and ephemeral as season's first fallen snowflake.

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 落雪
Skin.Introduction: It would be wise not to get on the queen of winter's bad side.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 落雪
Skin.Introduction: Webber never needs to buy a winter coat. He makes his own.

Skin.Name: 发霉的背包
Skin.Introduction: A backpack which has grown moldy from disuse.

Skin.Name: 彩色背包
Skin.Introduction: Carry your stuff in a '{Color}' colored backpack.

Skin.Name: 扣带背包
Skin.Introduction: A '{Color}' colored backpack with a big, curved buckle.

Skin.Name: 帆布背包
Skin.Introduction: A rustic rucksack in a '{Color}' color.

Skin.Name: 蝙蝠背包
Skin.Introduction: Behold, a batty black bat-shaped backpack. Bat.

Skin.Name: 皮弗娄牛提包
Skin.Introduction: A backpack made in the shape of a little beefalo. It's so cute and fluffy!

Skin.Name: 浣猫提包
Skin.Introduction: Squirrel away your items with this catcoon-shaped carryall.

Skin.Name: 灼热书包
Skin.Introduction: Dragon flier burning bright, in the desert quite a sight. What equipment is required to quench thy fearsome scorching fires?

Skin.Name: 兔子帆布背包
Skin.Introduction: Go down the rabbit hole with this rabbit-shaped backpack.

Skin.Name: 高鸟书包
Skin.Introduction: This smallbird won't ever grow up and reject you like a real smallbird would.

Skin.Name: 蜘蛛背包
Skin.Introduction: Wearing this backpack will let you make an arachnophobe's day a little bit worse. Or, you could ask yourself 'What would Willow do?' and burn it! Burn it with fire!

Skin.Name: 便便袋
Skin.Introduction: A bag shaped like feces. Obviously it was designed by somebody who enjoys sophomoric humor.

Skin.Name: 带刺桂冠
Skin.Introduction: Laurels ought rest on you, not the other way around.

Skin.Name: 松软稻草帽
Skin.Introduction: Be like a little British lady in your garden!

Skin.Name: 圆顶硬礼帽
Skin.Introduction: Demonstrate your impeccable style with this dapper bowler hat.

Skin.Name: 蜜蜂之矛
Skin.Introduction: It doesn't hit harder than a regular spear, although it certainly still stings.

Skin.Name: 玫瑰长矛
Skin.Introduction: No sharper than any other spear, though much lovelier.

Skin.Name: 风吹日晒的火把
Skin.Introduction: Give your torch some visual flare with these hastily wrapped, desiccated rags. Smoky!

Skin.Name: 拼布被子
Skin.Introduction: Nothing says "bedtime" quite like a bunch of little fabric squares sewn into one bigger, '{Color}' fabric square.

Skin.Name: 怪诞的斧头
Skin.Introduction: An elegantly engraved silver axe.

Skin.Name: 尖牙火坑
Skin.Introduction: Thish firepit ish made of rocksh that reshemble fangsh. What would it shay if it could shpeak?

Skin.Name: 手提旅行袋
Skin.Introduction: This bag made from luxurious carpet is the height of modern fashion!

Skin.Name: 宝藏宝箱
Skin.Introduction: A chest worthy of storing your finest gems and treasures. Or, y'know, twigs and manure.

Skin.Name: 小旅行箱
Skin.Introduction: Organize your foraged scraps in class and style.

Skin.Name: 轮船行李箱
Skin.Introduction: NOTE: Doesn't steam.

Skin.Name: 旅行者行李箱
Skin.Introduction: Its travelling days may be over, but it'll always have the memories.

Skin.Name: 简朴茶几
Skin.Introduction: A table that would be a truly elegant addition to any unkempt wilderness base.

Skin.Name: 龙蝇茶几
Skin.Introduction: An endtable inspired by the most opulent of bloodthirsty monsters.

Skin.Name: 古风茶几
Skin.Introduction: A quaint decorative table that would make your grandmother proud.

Skin.Name: 营地烹饪锅
Skin.Introduction: This cooking pot looks kind of beaten up, but the food it cooks still tastes delicious.

Skin.Name: 小双足飞龙
Skin.Introduction: This pet's doofy lil dragon face inspires both fear and wuv.

Skin.Name: 松狮蜥
Skin.Introduction: A pet as noble as he is huggable.

Skin.Name: 迷你丰碑火坑
Skin.Introduction: A firepit modeled after an ancient, giant monument. Luckily, this version is sized more appropriately for humans (and human-sized entities).

Skin.Name: 凄惨之炬
Skin.Introduction: At first glance this torch appears menacing, but holding it makes you feel quite sad.

Skin.Name: 凄惨之炬
Skin.Introduction: At first glance this torch appears menacing, but holding it makes you feel quite sad.

Skin.Name: 远古手杖
Skin.Introduction: To tread ancient paths, long forgotten.

Skin.Name: 远古国王之箱
Skin.Introduction: The history of an ancient people is locked away inside.

Skin.Name: 莱特曼运动夹克
Skin.Introduction: Run from ghosts and eat copious amounts in style in this slick Letterman Jacket!

Skin.Name: 神气的毛衣
Skin.Introduction: Donning this Smart Sweater impels the wearer to burgeon a broad, patrician lexicon.

Skin.Name: 黑冬帽
Skin.Introduction: A dark winter hat for the dark winter months.

Skin.Name: 粉冬帽
Skin.Introduction: Doesn't keep your head any warmer than a regular winter hat, but gosh if it isn't just the cutest.

Skin.Name: 兔蟹背包
Skin.Introduction: Watch out, this snappy backpack can get a little snippy!

Skin.Name: 巨鹿旅行包
Skin.Introduction: A backpack shaped like Deerclops. It's surprisingly cute!

Skin.Name: 格罗姆背包
Skin.Introduction: This pack is shaped like a friend.

Skin.Name: 曼德拉袋
Skin.Introduction: Keep this lil guy quiet by shoving some delicious loot in his mouth!

Skin.Name: 印花布切斯特之箱
Skin.Introduction: No Chesters were harmed in the making of this chest... I think.

Skin.Name: 海盗鸟笼
Skin.Introduction: The birds' swashbuckling days are over, thanks to this pirate-themed birdcage.

Skin.Name: 天使之心
Skin.Introduction: The slings and arrows of fate have taken their toll on this poor, afflicted heart.

Skin.Name: 地火
Skin.Introduction: Bottomless pits are the best. But bottomless pits filled with fire are even better.

Skin.Name: 狸猫装
Skin.Introduction: This Catty Costume will make you look like one fine feline!

Skin.Name: 切斯特装
Skin.Introduction: Don't worry, that's faux-Chester fur.

Skin.Name: 格罗姆外衣
Skin.Introduction: Cover up your full moon with this adorable Glommy Guise!

Skin.Name: 哈奇伪装品
Skin.Introduction: The perfect look for going underground and undercover.

Skin.Name: 狸猫装配帽
Skin.Introduction: Is that really a cap with a catcoon's face? You've gotta be kitten me!

Skin.Name: 切斯特配帽
Skin.Introduction: They say that imitation is the sincerest form of flattery.

Skin.Name: 格罗姆配帽
Skin.Introduction: The goopiness inside the rim makes it glom to your head that much better!

Skin.Name: 哈奇装配帽
Skin.Introduction: It's a Hutch hatch, for your head!

Skin.Name: 万圣节之光
Skin.Introduction: Repel the dark these Hallowed Nights with a dreadful beacon of most Hallowed Light.

Skin.Name: 毛骨悚然的鸟笼
Skin.Introduction: Trap birds in a prison of their own making.

Skin.Name: 毛骨悚然的大锅
Skin.Introduction: Double, double, broil and gobble, campfire burns and crockpot bubbles!

Skin.Name: 吸血小蝙蝠
Skin.Introduction: You'd have to be blind not to appreciate this bat's horrifying adorableness.

Skin.Name: 守卫猪套装
Skin.Introduction: Piggsbury Costume

Skin.Name: 龙蝇套装
Skin.Introduction: Willowfly Costume

Skin.Name: 海象套装
Skin.Introduction: MacWolf Costume

Skin.Name: 诱饵草套装
Skin.Introduction: Wendyflower Costume

Skin.Name: 战车套装
Skin.Introduction: Rookiebot Costume

Skin.Name: 电羊套装
Skin.Introduction: Ms. Voltbottom Costume

Skin.Name: 树人套装
Skin.Introduction: Woodguard Costume

Skin.Name: 曼德拉草套装
Skin.Introduction: Wesdrake Costume

Skin.Name: 坎普斯套装
Skin.Introduction: Krampwell Costume

Skin.Name: 巨鹿套装
Skin.Introduction: Deerfrid Costume

Skin.Name: 蝙蝠套装
Skin.Introduction: Webilisk Costume

Skin.Name: 草丛壁虎套装
Skin.Introduction: Nona Gekko Costume

Skin.Name: 圣诞长袜帽
Skin.Introduction: One might wear this '{Color}' winter hat on a cozy night around a campfire. Or, hey, they might not.

Skin.Name: 冬青花环
Skin.Introduction: A jolly holly laurel to wear on your head. How winter-y!

Skin.Name: 丝带花环
Skin.Introduction: Get in the seasonal spirit by wreathing your head in lovely ribbons!

Skin.Name: 圣诞外衣
Skin.Introduction: Put another log on the fire! No, seriously, it's about to go out.

Skin.Name: 圣诞礼服
Skin.Introduction: A dashing frock for dashing through the snow!

Skin.Name: 装饰鸟笼
Skin.Introduction: Imprison a bird in a wreath of seasonal cheer.

Skin.Name: 极地小龙蝇
Skin.Introduction: This Broodling renounced its fiery ways... Now it's a lovely shade of blue!

Skin.Name: 雪花格罗咪
Skin.Introduction: What a precious little snowball you are, Glomglom!

Skin.Name: 小雪猫
Skin.Introduction: Did this Kittykit just get cuter? (How's that even possible?!)

Skin.Name: 雪片小钢羊
Skin.Introduction: Winter doesn't seem quite as cold when you have a fleecy Ewelet by your side.

Skin.Name: 北极小座狼
Skin.Introduction: Looks like this adorable little lump grew his winter coat in. Good boy, Vargling!

Skin.Name: 小企鸥
Skin.Introduction: This plump little fellow is sure to brighten even the bitterest of winter nights!

Skin.Name: 叮当高礼帽
Skin.Introduction: A festive 'firehound red' colored tophat.

Skin.Name: 葡萄干布丁帽
Skin.Introduction: This plum pudding hat contains no plums. Just a bunch of raisins.

Skin.Name: 姜饼宝箱
Skin.Introduction: Don't be fooled... it's completely inedible.

Skin.Name: 打结的猎人帽
Skin.Introduction: This trapper hat appears to have been permanently tied up. Luckily it looks stylish that way.

Skin.Name: 猎人帽
Skin.Introduction: This trapper hat is soft and cozy, but the ends don't seem to tie up anymore.

Skin.Name: 小公鸡
Skin.Introduction: If you wanted a bouncy rooster companion by your side, then you're in cluck!

Skin.Name: 咯咯冬帽
Skin.Introduction: This winter hat is strangely reminiscent of a small feathered friend.

Skin.Name: 好运兽装
Skin.Introduction: The perfect outfit for a dance or two.

Skin.Name: 好运兽服
Skin.Introduction: All ready for a spectacular performance!

Skin.Name: 丝绸锦缎外套
Skin.Introduction: A silken brocade coat in a lovely 'willful green' shade.

Skin.Name: 丝绸睡衣
Skin.Introduction: Luxurious PJs in a handsome 'doydoy teal'.

Skin.Name: 咯咯拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: Slip your feet into some fluffy, comfy chicken slippers.

Skin.Name: 生命花环
Skin.Introduction: This lovely wreath of Life Blossoms have lost their magic, but they still look divine.

Skin.Name: 羽毛花环
Skin.Introduction: This feather hat is so luxurious to the touch!

Skin.Name: 带刺的头盔
Skin.Introduction: Who wouldn't be intimidated by this fearsome helm?

Skin.Name: 透视生命护符
Skin.Introduction: This Life Giving Amulet was crafted in Battlemaster Pugna's Forge.

Skin.Name: 编织草甲
Skin.Introduction: Extra care and craftsmanship was put into weaving this grass armor.

Skin.Name: 羽毛草甲
Skin.Introduction: This delicately woven cloak is an excellent decorative piece.

Skin.Name: 硬木盔甲
Skin.Introduction: This wood armor is a fresh decorative take on a timeless functional design.

Skin.Name: 齿木盔甲
Skin.Introduction: The fangs are purely decorative. They're not even real!

Skin.Name: 绸木盔甲
Skin.Introduction: This silken wood armor provides no additional protection, but at least it stops the splinters.

Skin.Name: 大理石夹板
Skin.Introduction: This splint mail is crafted of many marble slabs chained together.

Skin.Name: 大理石板甲
Skin.Introduction: This armor is the fastest way there is to get chiseled abs.

Skin.Name: 帕格纳的火腿棒
Skin.Introduction: This ham bat was fashioned after the scepter of the great Battlemaster Pugna.

Skin.Name: 地狱火杖
Skin.Introduction: This fire staff is strangely reminiscent of the Infernal Staff found in The Forge.

Skin.Name: 《末日将至：镀金版》
Skin.EnName: The End is Nigh: Gilded Edition
Skin.Introduction: The lettering inside is exquisitely calligraphed.

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: This wouldn't be the first time Wilson's had to fight off a goon or two.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Willow was never one to be pushed around.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Wolfgang's no stranger to the art of pugilism.

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: If Wendy is to succumb to death, she'll do so on her own terms.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Few things get them more excited than the prospect of destroying fleshlings.

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Wickerbottom is not opposed to self defense, should the occasion call for it.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: It's best not to mess with a man and his axe.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Wes is quiet, but not meek.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Maxwell believes this look to be quite intimidating.

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Wigfrid was born for the arena.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Webber's used to fending for himself.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 挑战者
Skin.Introduction: Winona came ready for a fight!

Skin.Name: 橡木之躯
Skin.Introduction: This chassis is all bark and no byte.

Skin.Name: 果农长袍
Skin.Introduction: Tincap not included.

Skin.Name: 野兽派风格罩衫
Skin.Introduction: These artist's tools are mostly for show. It's not easy to get ahold of paints in the wilderness.

Skin.Name: 德鲁伊之袍
Skin.Introduction: The leaves on this tunic never wilt nor die, but neither do they grow.

Skin.Name: 森林哨兵长袍
Skin.Introduction: The folds of this fabric sway in the breeze, reminding the wearer of leaves on the wind.

Skin.Name: 园艺围裙
Skin.Introduction: This delightful frock is cool and comfortable, perfect for an afternoon of gardening.

Skin.Name: 橡木手套
Skin.Introduction: Get in touch with nature with these clinging vine hand replacements.

Skin.Name: 果农手镯
Skin.Introduction: These wrist bands have been delicately woven by deft hands.

Skin.Name: 野兽派风格手套
Skin.Introduction: Gloves to paint cheery, small trees in.

Skin.Name: 德鲁伊的腕带
Skin.Introduction: There's a perpetual dew dotting the leaves on the back of these gloves.

Skin.Name: 森林哨兵腕套
Skin.Introduction: These wrist coverings belong to someone who is at home in the woods.

Skin.Name: 沾满泥的园艺手套
Skin.Introduction: These once-thick gardening gloves are old and worn. They won't provide much protection anymore.

Skin.Name: 果农短裤
Skin.Introduction: These old trousers are as traditional as they are uncomfortable.

Skin.Name: 德鲁伊的绑腿
Skin.Introduction: These leggings are as breezy as the trees in spring!

Skin.Name: 哨兵护腿
Skin.Introduction: Too many snags on piercing thorns and grabbing branches have left this kilt in tatters.

Skin.Name: 园艺长裤
Skin.Introduction: These old trousers have seen many an hour of hard labor.

Skin.Name: 橡木之靴
Skin.Introduction: Reject hi-tech sorcery and return to your technological roots.

Skin.Name: 果农的鹿皮鞋
Skin.Introduction: They smell faintly of apples.

Skin.Name: 野兽派风格乐福鞋
Skin.Introduction: The paint is never going to come out of these shoes.

Skin.Name: 德鲁伊之鞋
Skin.Introduction: Ground yourself by feeling the earth beneath your feet.

Skin.Name: 森林哨兵之鞋
Skin.Introduction: It feels as though the owner of these sandals would rather run barefoot.

Skin.Name: 沾满泥的园艺靴
Skin.Introduction: Maybe wipe these boots off before you walk on the clean floors.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 苍翠
Skin.Introduction: WX-78 has become a solar powered robot.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 苍翠
Skin.Introduction: All Woodie needs is the sun, the rain, and his favourite tree seeds.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 苍翠
Skin.Introduction: Wes is an avid landscape painter in his downtime.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 苍翠
Skin.Introduction: Maxwell is capable of tapping into many magical energies, including those of the natural world.

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 苍翠
Skin.Introduction: Wigfrid would fight to her last breath to protect the spirit of the forest.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 苍翠
Skin.Introduction: Winona's fingers are so callused, she barely even feels rose thorns.

Skin.Name: 幼犬皮帽
Skin.Introduction: Not made of real puppies.

Skin.Name: 猎犬战盔
Skin.Introduction: BEWARE OF DOG.

Skin.Name: 克莱蒙特生命护符
Skin.Introduction: All hearts can be mended with time and care.

Skin.Name: 针绒鬣犬皮帽
Skin.Introduction: Happiness is a warm puppy hat.

Skin.Name: 罗曼蒂克鸟笼
Skin.Introduction: Perhaps the bird will enjoy its stay.

Skin.Name: 凤凰火坑
Skin.Introduction: This fire pit is adorned by several lovely stone wings.

Skin.Name: 纯种小座狼
Skin.Introduction: This lil puppy can't see where it's going without its hair tied up. Adorable!

Skin.Name: 纯血小座狼
Skin.Introduction: This puppy has a chubby face you can't help but smush. So cute!

Skin.Name: 医师的外衣
Skin.Introduction: Have you tried amputating what ails you?

Skin.Name: 街头小贩的破碎衣物
Skin.Introduction: These rags keep most of the cold out on those bitter nights in the rookeries.

Skin.Name: 拳击手的大衣
Skin.Introduction: For when you've a match scheduled naught an hour after high tea.

Skin.Name: 服丧丧服
Skin.Introduction: No expense has been spared in these grimly beautiful mourning clothes.

Skin.Name: 潜水服
Skin.Introduction: It seems this elaborate diving suit was constructed with artistic taste in mind. It has no functional purpose.

Skin.Name: 贵族的傲气盛装
Skin.Introduction: The perfect outfit for lounging in the drawing room, or putting the upper crust in their place.

Skin.Name: 商人的皮衣
Skin.Introduction: A gentleman's overcoat embellished with fine, rare furs.

Skin.Name: 清洁工的褴褛衣物
Skin.Introduction: It's a good bet that the owner of these clothes spent significant time in a chimney.

Skin.Name: 贵族的精美大衣
Skin.Introduction: The extravagant attire of an influential upper cruster.

Skin.Name: 悲剧女演员戏服
Skin.Introduction: This actress fought tooth and nail for this prestigious Shakespearean role.

Skin.Name: 学生制服
Skin.Introduction: Someone's mother dressed them this morning.

Skin.Name: 铁匠的围裙
Skin.Introduction: Keep oil and automaton grease off your clothing with this fine leather apron.

Skin.Name: 医师的手套
Skin.Introduction: Don't worry, this won't hurt a bit!

Skin.Name: 街头小贩的手套
Skin.Introduction: These matchstick seller gloves do little to keep out the cold.

Skin.Name: 拳击手套
Skin.Introduction: Left hook! Right hook! Jab, jab!

Skin.Name: 服丧手套
Skin.Introduction: Soft gloves to hold your heartbreak.

Skin.Name: 潜水服手套
Skin.Introduction: These diving suit gloves are old and worn. They probably aren't waterproof anymore.

Skin.Name: 贵族的傲气袖子
Skin.Introduction: You'll be the envy of all at the luncheon in this refined number.

Skin.Name: 商人的袖口
Skin.Introduction: Keep your hands free for tanning pelts!

Skin.Name: 清洁工的手套
Skin.Introduction: These were white gloves when you first started in the sweep business.

Skin.Name: 贵族的精致手套
Skin.Introduction: A pair of white gloves for a high class snob.

Skin.Name: 悲剧女演员的手套
Skin.Introduction: A pair of thin cloth gloves, likely worn by an actress.

Skin.Name: 学生的袖口
Skin.Introduction: A pair of cuffs to wear when studiously practicing the three Rs.

Skin.Name: 铁匠的手套
Skin.Introduction: Thick gloves for transferring smelted metals.

Skin.Name: 拳击手的长裤
Skin.Introduction: Just pull them on and jump in the ring!

Skin.Name: 潜水服底裤
Skin.Introduction: The bottom of this diving suit is just for show. It doesn't keep out water anymore.

Skin.Name: 商人的裤腿
Skin.Introduction: Comes with shin guards to ward off rabid beavers. (Note: Useless against all other animals)

Skin.Name: 贵族的精美长裤
Skin.Introduction: Buckle up for a night on the town.

Skin.Name: 悲剧女演员的长裤
Skin.Introduction: These pants allow freedom of movement and complete mobility for an incredible performance.

Skin.Name: 铁匠的裤子
Skin.Introduction: If the smithy floor is covered in hay, you never know when you might step on a nail.

Skin.Name: 医师的鞋子
Skin.Introduction: Shoes that have tread on many a spilled concoction.

Skin.Name: 街头小贩的拖鞋
Skin.Introduction: The cold of the cobblestones seeps right through them.

Skin.Name: 服丧鞋
Skin.Introduction: Heavy shoes to tread the path of sorrow.

Skin.Name: 贵族的傲气高跟鞋
Skin.Introduction: Fashionably heeled shoes for a woman of high society.

Skin.Name: 清洁工的鞋子
Skin.Introduction: Black shoes don't show the soot.

Skin.Name: 学生的爪子
Skin.Introduction: Don't forget your slate on the way to the schoolhouse.

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Wilson's had a lot of experience cooking with found ingredients.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Chef Willow is a grease fire waiting to happen.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Wolfgang can't relax unless all of his friends are well fed.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Wendy's not had much kitchen experience, but she’s willing to learn.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: WX must have some utensil addons somewhere around here.

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Wickerbottom has several cookbooks for just such an occasion.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Woodie's not beyond using an axe in the kitchen.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Wes knows a meal is good when the whole table eats in silence.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Maxwell is ready to roll up his sleeves and get cooking.

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Wigfrid has many pot roasts in her future.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Webber loves helping out in the kitchen.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 厨师
Skin.Introduction: Cooking is basically just food assembly, right?

Skin.Name: 威尔逊 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: Wilson is a major advocate of the health benefits of of leeches.

Skin.Name: 薇洛 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: Willow doesn't just play with matches... she also peddles them.

Skin.Name: 沃尔夫冈 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: Pugilism is a gentleman's sport.

Skin.Name: 温蒂 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: Wendy is the queen of strict, socially mandated mourning practices.

Skin.Name: WX-78 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: These are their diving gears.

Skin.Name: 维克波顿 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: Wickerbottom accrue her fortune? Perhaps you should mind your own business.

Skin.Name: 伍迪 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: Woodie's wilderness survival comes in handy in the great North.

Skin.Name: 韦斯 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: The sweep's work is quite grueling. He'd prefer not to talk about it.

Skin.Name: 麦克斯韦 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: Money and affluence have gone straight to this gentleman's head.

Skin.Name: 维格弗里德 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: It seems Ms. Wigfrid can connect to the poetry of any tragedy.

Skin.Name: 韦伯 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: This lively young lad has a most healthy pallor.

Skin.Name: 薇诺娜 - 维多利亚
Skin.Introduction: Winona dreams up all sorts of fantastic mechanical inventions in her private workshop.

Skin.Name: 西式炖肉棒
Skin.Introduction: Delicious, delicious murder.

Skin.Name: 怪诞的铲子
Skin.Introduction: A lovely shovel with decorative silver engravings.

Skin.Name: 羊头拐杖
Skin.Introduction: A cane to accompany you on your afternoon stroll.

Skin.Name: 汤碗
Skin.Introduction: This crockpot is shaped like an elegant Victorian tureen.

Skin.Name: 维多利亚火炉
Skin.Introduction: The heart of every household.

Skin.Name: 维多利亚冰箱
Skin.Introduction: A sophisticated ice box, for the sophisticated wilderness dweller.

Skin.Introduction:
A deep /swoon is not for the faint of heart.

Skin.Name: 动作表情-困倦
Skin.Introduction:
You are getting veeery /sleepy...
收集一套同色的“杰米衬衫”、“杰米长裤”、“拼布被子”皮肤后可以使用

Skin.Name: 动作表情-打哈欠
Skin.Introduction:
Just /yawn and everyone will know you're ready for an adorable nap!

Skin.Name: 动作表情-握拳头

Skin.Introduction:
